headline: Coronavirus hospitalizations grow in the Midwest amid climbing cases — 'It's clearly a forest fire'
summary: Six states reached record high Covid-19 hospitalizations as of Friday, based on a weekly average, including Missouri, Wisconsin, North Dakota and South Dakota.

headline: States are finally starting to use the Covid-tracking tech Apple and Google built -- here's why
summary: The Apple-Google system for sending Covid-19 alerts is gaining momentum in the United States, six months after it was first announced.
As some of the largest wildfires ever rage in California, firefighting tactics remain stagnant. Innovation needs a boost to catch up with the rate at which the west is burning.
headline: How the U.S. battles forest fires and why more innovation is desperately needed

summary: For many Americans, retiring early may mean giving up their employer-subsidized health insurance. Here are a few options for coverage that won't break the bank.

headline: The White House hoped testing would keep the coronavirus out — but it didn't

summary: Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg, Google and Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai and Twitter CEO Jack Dorsey will testify on Section 230 of the Communications Decency Act. The hearing will also cover the topics of privacy and "media domination."
headline: Facebook, Google and Twitter CEOs to testify before Congress on Oct. 28
'No Time to Die' pushed to April 2021 as coronavirus cases continue to rise
summary: "No Time to Die," the James Bond film that was the first Hollywood feature to move on the theatrical caledar due to the coronavirus outbreak, is moving again. This time, it's got its sights on 2021.

headline: S&P 500 falls after Trump tests positive for coronavirus – what Cramer and five others are watching
White House reveals Trump's coronavirus treatment, says he is 'fatigued but in good spirits'
summary: The White House said Friday that President Donald Trump is "fatigued but in good spirits" and shared information about his treatment following his coronavirus diagnosis.

headline: Lululemon could be about to resume its rally. A trader lays out a way to catch the upside
summary: Onetime high-flyer Lululemon has run into trouble over the past month. Todd Gordon of TradingAnalysis.com sees upside from here.

headline: Facebook rebuts 'The Social Dilemma,' a popular Netflix documentary

summary: Investors had been pushing the markets to new highs since stay-at-home orders in March, led by megacap technology.

headline: Pelosi vows more support for airlines, asks carriers to hold off on furloughs
Trump isn't the first sitting U.S. president to contract a potentially deadly virus in middle of a pandemic, so did Woodrow Wilson in 1918
summary: Former President Woodrow Wilson became ill with the 1918 flu when he was in Paris in April of 1919, much like current President Donald Trump's Covid-19 diagnosis in 2020.

headline: Traders say the Softbank 'whale' may be back as options activity spikes for Big Tech stocks

summary: Shares of Twilio extended its gains into Friday morning, reaching a 52-week high, after the company said in a filing that it expects better-than-expected third-quarter revenue.

summary: Cloud stocks are "setting up for outperformance into the end of the year" based on a key chart, says Miller Tabak's Matt Maley.
